alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:16PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Graham County through 200 PM MST... At 116 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Roper Lake State Park, or 17 miles southwest of Safford, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Grant, Mount Graham and Bonita. This includes Route 266 between mile markers 107 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
